JOB DESCRIPTION:
Job Description :

 Carry out requirements elicitation and detailed design by creation of class diagrams.

 Develop data access layer to access and update information in the database.

 Support the development effort and the delivery of the project by periodical code reviews and unit testing of the applications.

 Handle complete software development life cycle (SDLC) such as user interaction,  requirement analysis,  design,  development,  implementation,  integration,  documentation,  testing,  deployment,  builds,  configuration and code management.

 Analyze and document the changes related to the enhancements for the manipulation of existing table structure.

 Interact with the development team to resolve any environment related issues and setting up the environment for integration and QA testing.

 Utilize tools and technologies including C#.NET,  LINQ,  UML,  XML,  SQL Server,  WPF,  ASP.NET,  AJAX,  JavaScript,  HTML,  DHTML,  CSS,  Web Services,  WCF,  Web API,  Angular JS,  JQuery,  Azure,  and IBM Tivoli.



Requirement

 Bachelor s or equivalent in Computer Science/ Applications/  Engineering,  Information Technology/ Systems or Electronics/ Electrical Engineering + minimum 2 years experience as Software Developer,  Software Engineer,  Programmer Analyst,  Technical Architect or related.

 Will accept 3 years of university academic coursework and 5 years of work experience.

 Must have 2 years of experience in the skills listed above.
